items.title: Most affordable Apple Watch Series 10 models hit all-time lows in early Black Friday sale at $150 off, deals from $249
items.summary:
Update: Amazon has now price matched from $249 on both Apple Watch Series 10 sizes – no Walmart+ required:

  • 46mm Apple Watch Series 10 $279 (Orig. $429)

As part of the now live Walmart Event 1 Black Friday sale, Walmart is now offering the lowest prices we have tracked online for Apple Watch Series 10. The 42mm model is now down at $249and the 46mm is going for $279 – we are expecting an Amazon price match very soon. These deals at Walmart are only available for Walmart+ members until midnight tonight.

As part of its ongoing early Black Friday Sale, and running parallel to the Black Friday Battery Sale, Lectric has launched a Stocking Stuffer Weekend Flash Sale with an additional 15% savings across its lineup of add-on accessories after using the code EXTRA15 at checkout, making it a great time to deck out your ride with any gear you may have been wanting. If you’ve been cruising on a Lectric e-bike over the years, or just got your first recently, you can now add more to your experience with offers like the brand’s Phone Mount at $25 and a pair of mirrors at $28, or you could pick up a Water-Resistant Pannier Bag at $46 and bring furry companions along with the Pet Trailer for $152, with so many more options to choose from. Head below to check out the lineup of deals while they last through the rest of this weekend (ending November 16).
